title.subText: If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to

FQ1.q: When is the $DEVE token expected to launch?
FQ1.a: The exact launch date for the $DEVE token is not predetermined. It will be set immediately after the Pre-Sale process is completed.

FQ2.q: What are the ways to purchase $DEVE tokens?
FQ2.a: $DEVE tokens can be acquired via blockchain networks (BSC, ETH, POLYGON) or through authorised payment methods like Visa, Apple Pay, and Google Pay.

FQ3.q: How can I obtain a referral link, and what is its function?
FQ3.a: After making an initial purchase of at least $5, you will be eligible to receive a referral link. This link enables you to earn 5% of the purchase value, which will be added to your wallet.

FQ4.q: When can I access my tokens following a purchase?
FQ4.a: You will gain access to your tokens upon completing the Pre-Sale phases. They can be collected through the designated website.

FQ5.q: What is the method for tracking my referrals?
FQ5.a: To track your referrals, simply connect your wallet and review the comprehensive information provided.
